channel_permissions.name: Pin Messages
channel_permissions.description: Allows users to pin messages in the channel.

channel_permissions.name: View Channel
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to view a channel, which includes reading messages in text channels

channel_permissions.name: Send Messages
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to send messages in a channel

channel_permissions.name: Voice Connect
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to connect to a voice channel

channel_permissions.name: Voice Speak
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to speak in a voice channel

channel_permissions.name: Use Voice Activity
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to use voice-activity-detection in a voice channel

channel_permissions.name: Video
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to stream video in a voice channel

channel_permissions.name: Media
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to stream media in a voice channel

channel_permissions.name: Use Slash Commands
channel_permissions.description: Allows the user to use slash commands

channel_permissions.name: Kick Members
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to kick other members

channel_permissions.name: Ban Members
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to ban other members

channel_permissions.name: Mute Members
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to mute other members

channel_permissions.name: Deafen Members
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to deafen other members

channel_permissions.name: Move Members
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to move other members between voice channels

channel_permissions.name: Manage Channels
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to create, edit, and delete channels

channel_permissions.name: Manage Roles
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to create, edit, and delete roles

channel_permissions.name: Manage Webhooks
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to create, edit, and delete webhooks

channel_permissions.name: Manage Emojis
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to create, edit, and delete emojis

channel_permissions.name: Manage Threads
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to create, edit, and delete threads

channel_permissions.name: Use Public Threads
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to use public threads

channel_permissions.name: Use Private Threads
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to use private threads

channel_permissions.name: Use External Emojis
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to use emojis from different guilds

channel_permissions.name: Add Reactions
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to add reactions to messages

channel_permissions.name: Send TTS Messages
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to send TTS messages

channel_permissions.name: Manage Messages
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to delete and edit other members messages

channel_permissions.name: Embed Links
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to send messages that contain links

channel_permissions.name: Attach Files
channel_permissions.description: Allows members to attach files

server_permissions.name: Manage Channels
server_permissions.description: Allows the user to create, edit, and delete channels

server_permissions.name: Manage Categories
server_permissions.description: Allows the user to create, edit, and delete categories

server_permissions.name: Manage Roles
server_permissions.description: Allows the user to create, edit, and delete roles

server_permissions.name: Manage Webhooks
server_permissions.description: Allows the user to create, edit, and delete webhooks

server_permissions.name: Manage Emojis
server_permissions.description: Allows the user to create, edit, and delete emojis

server_permissions.name: Manage Server
server_permissions.description: Allows the user to edit the server information, region, etc.

server_permissions.name: Kick Members
server_permissions.description: Allows the user to kick members from the server

server_permissions.name: Ban Members
server_permissions.description: Allows the user to ban members from the server

channels.name: rules
channels.description: Read the rules before you start chatting!
